summary: Reducing the influence of gravity on bolts
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][b]Requirements[/b]
Dawnguard[/color]

[b]Description[/b]
This mod greatly reduces the impact of gravity on all bolts added by dawnguard (reduced from default 0.35 to 0.05).

According to UESPWiki you have to modify your Skyrim.ini to take full advantage of the increased flight range. 
[url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Archery]See the notes section in the article there[/url]

[b]Conflicts[/b]
This mod will conflict with mods that edit the bolt-related projectiles

[b]Manual Installation (for those who don\'t use Nexus Mod Manager)[/b]
Just extract the contents of the .rar into your Skyrim/Data folder and enable \"Lesser Gravity For Bolts\" in the Skyrim launcher under \"Data files\".

[b]Manual Uninstallation (for those who don\'t use Nexus Mod Manager)[/b]
Delete the file you extracted to your Skyrim/Data folder.

[b]Changelog[/b]
1.0 - Initial release
author: Sephiroth018
